quotes.quote: Someday perhaps change will occur when times are ready for it instead of always when it is too late. Someday change will be accepted as life itself.
The road to someday leads to a town of nowhere.
You can't always be pushing people away. Someday nobody'll come back.
Someday is a disease that will take your dreams to the grave with you.
Someday. That's a dangerous word. It's really just a code for never.
Someday was the thing he had, because it was a lot harder to ruin than today.
Live every day as if it's going to be your last, and one day, you'll be right.
Someday, someday, but certainly not now, I'd like to learn how to have a conversation.
Someday is not a day of the week.
Someday we will dare to trade good for true.
Someday death will take us to another star.
Some days you just have to create your own sunshine.
My life will end someday, but it will end at my convenience.
However long the moon disappears, someday it must shine again.
No matter how fast a lie runs, the truth will someday overtake it.
Hard work does not go unnoticed, and someday the rewards will follow.
Someday a political genius will come along and make the Senate work.
Heaven will happen someday, but let's not wait. Heaven can start now.
Wisdom eventually comes to all of us. Someday it might even be your turn.
The leaf, still green, must someday fall such grief and joy to live at all.
Everyone will someday be judged for what they do, and Jah is the only judge.
Anyone whose goal is 'something higher' must expect some day to suffer vertigo.
Someday, without fail, everyone will disappear, scattered into the blackness of time.
Maybe at the heart of all our traveling is the dream of someday, somehow, getting Home.
Someday you will know that the heart is not always as wise as it is strong.
I've always liked, someday the lamb will lay by the lion.... but it won't get much sleep.
If someone has offended you, start sowing forgiveness. You may need some yourself someday.
A perfect world or a world destroyed, one or the other- someday will come the end of hell.
Some days we lose all at once and somedays we get all back at once. But either way,Accept it.
It takes a noble man to plant a seed for a tree that will some day give shade to people he may never meet.
